def solution(number):
    A = (number - 1) // 3
    B = (number - 1) // 5
    C = (number - 1) // 15    
    return [A - C, B - C, C]

def solution(number):
    n = number - 1
    a, b, c = n // 3, n // 5, n // 15
    return [a - c, b - c, c]

def solution(number):
    number = number - 1
    fizzbuzz = number // 15
    fizz = number // 3 - fizzbuzz
    buzz = number // 5 - fizzbuzz
    return [fizz, buzz, fizzbuzz]

def solution(number):
    number = number - 1
    c = int(number/15)
    b = int(number/5) - c
    a = int(number/3) - c
    return [a, b, c]
def solution(n): c = lambda x: (n - 1) // x if x == 15 else (n - 1) // x - c(15); return [c(3), c(5), c(15)]
